channel.title: The new anti-spam measures
channel.description: So what are the details of these anti-spam measures? First step is a warning. Second step is moderation (to my knowledge, I'm the only person with this status). Third step is banning? Are these permanent? Are you mods going to forever approve each and every one of my posts? Is it worth it?

item.title: The new anti-spam measures
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“Starblaster100, post:3, topic:41886”]Warned, Moderated, Muted, Banned

Warned is your first warning,
Moderated is your second warning
Muted means Admins have to approve your posts (As i did with this one)
Banned = Banned

All last 7 days except banned which is permanent, or a Mod specifies otherwise.[/quote]
Why moderated? That gave me a bit of confusion, I thought those pplz were mods 0.-…change it?

Read full topic

item.title: The new anti-spam measures
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Starblaster100, post:3, topic:41886”]Warned, Moderated, Muted, Banned

Warned is your first warning,
Moderated is your second warning
Muted means Admins have to approve your posts (As i did with this one)
Banned = Banned

All last 7 days except banned which is permanent, or a Mod specifies otherwise.[/quote]

Oh I see. So this won’t be permanent. But what is the difference between muted and moderated? Is it that admins have to approve muted posts and mods can approve moderated posts?

Read full topic
